description: To create a SKETCHPAD file in Sketchpad, select the "Export" floppy disk icon and click "Save Sketchpad" in the menu. You can also save an image in Sketchpad as a .JPEG , .PNG , .PDF , or .SVG file. To open a SKETCHPAD file in Sketchpad, select the "Import" folder icon.
NOTE: Sketchpad is available as a desktop program for Windows and macOS and as a web program.

common_filenames.description: Drawing.sketchpad - Default filename given to an exported SKETCHPAD file.
